txt.en: Return to Bâdarul in Iridír and inform him that you have armed the new recruits and they are not ready to begin training.

Some new recruits have volunteered in Iridír after news of the attacks. Bâdarul has asked that you help supply them with weapons so they can begin their training.\n\nGather supplies of weapons from crates nearby.
Arm the recruits in Iridír with the weapons they desire so that they can begin their training.
'Thank you, I will put this to good use.'
'I will return to Bâdarul to begin my training.'
Some new recruits have volunteered in Iridír after news of the attacks. Bâdarul has asked that you help supply them with weapons so they can begin their training.

'Greetings [placeholder]. In the wake of the assault led by Bârshud II we have many people from the area gathering here to volunteer to fight back.\n\n'This warms my heart to see such bravery. I will be busy training the recruits as they are ready but I know that some are still needing to be armed before they can begin. Take some weapons from the crates nearby and arm the recruits with the weapons they desire to learn.'
'The recruits have been arriving and telling me that you supplied them all! I will have them in fighting shape in no time.'
